summary: A story creation and sharing website with AI-generated stories across multiple genres (love, horror, fantasy, romance, thriller, science fiction, historical). Users can create and publish their own stories, and all stories can be read aloud using AI text-to-speech.
architectural_notes: Website platform for story creation and sharing
Multi-genre story support (love, horror, fantasy, romance, thriller, science fiction, historical)
AI integration for story generation and text-to-speech
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Decorative book or manuscript illustration for the homepage hero section (hero-books.dim_1200x600.png)
- Genre icons for each of the seven story categories: love, horror, fantasy, romance, thriller, science fiction, historical (genre-love.dim_128x128.png, genre-horror.dim_128x128.png, genre-fantasy.dim_128x128.png, genre-romance.dim_128x128.png, genre-thriller.dim_128x128.png, genre-scifi.dim_128x128.png, genre-historical.dim_128x128.png)

existing_features.title: Create a frontend story browsing interface that displays all stories organized by genre with navigation between genres
Build a story creation form where users can write and publish new stories with title, content, and genre selection
Implement a story reading view that displays the full story content with a text-to-speech feature that reads the story aloud using browser speech synthesis
Design a visually engaging and immersive interface with a literary or storytelling theme that uses warm, inviting colors and typography suitable for a reading experience

new_feature_requests.summary: AI story generation across multiple genres (love, horror, fantasy, romance, thriller, sci-fi, historical)
User story creation and publishing system
AI text-to-speech for reading stories aloud

Create a backend data model for stories that includes fields for title, content, author, genre (love, horror, fantasy, romance, thriller, science fiction, historical), creation date, and whether it is AI-generated or user-created
Implement backend functions to create, retrieve, list, and filter stories by genre
Generate a collection of AI-generated sample stories for each genre (love, horror, fantasy, romance, thriller, science fiction, historical) and seed them in the backend on initialization
